description.english: Find the first ornament

description.english: Find half of all ornaments

description.english: Find all the ornaments

description.english: Find the first card from the Pantheon

description.english: Find half of the cards from the Pantheon

description.english: Find all the cards from the Pantheon

description.english: Finish a Minigame in less than 1 minute
description.german: Vollende ein Minispiel in weniger als 1 Minute
description.french: Termine un Mini-jeu en moins d’1 minute
description.italian: Completa un mini gioco in meno di 1 minuto
description.schinese: 在不到一分钟的时间完成任意一个小游戏
description.russian: Пройдите мини-игру менее, чем за 1 минуту
description.japanese: 1分以内にミニゲームを終える
description.polish: Ukończ Minigrę w mniej niż minutę

description.english: Finish three Minigames in a row without skipping
description.german: Vollende drei Minispiele in Reihe, ohne eines zu überspringen
description.french: Termine trois Mini-jeux d’affilé sans passer
description.italian: Completa una serie di 3 mini giochi senza saltarne uno
description.schinese: 不跳过连续完成3个小游戏
description.russian: Пройдите три мини-игры подряд без пропусков
description.japanese: スキップせずに連続で3つのミニゲームを終える
description.polish: Ukończ trzy Minigry pod rząd bez Pomijania

description.english: Finish all Minigames without skipping
description.german: Vollende alle Minispiele ohne eines zu überspringen
description.french: Termine tous les Mini-jeux sans passer
description.italian: Completa tutti i mini giochi senza saltarne uno
description.schinese: 在不跳过的情况下完成所有小游戏
description.japanese: すべてのミニゲームをスキップせずに終える

description.english: Find 3 Hidden Objects in 3 seconds
description.german: Finde 3 versteckte Objekte in 3 Sekunden
description.french: Trouve 3 Objets Cachés en 3 secondes
description.italian: Trova 3 oggetti nascosti in 3 secondi
description.schinese: 在3秒内找到3个隐藏物品
description.japanese: 3 秒以内に 3 つの隠しオブジェクトを見つける
description.polish: Znajdź trzy Ukryte Obiekty w trzy sekundy

description.english: Complete 3 Hidden Object Puzzles with no more than 5 mistakes in each one
description.german: Vollende 3 Wimmelbild-Puzzles mit nicht mehr als 5 Fehlern in jedem
description.french: Termine 3 Puzzles d’Objets Cachés avec pas plus de 5 erreurs dans chacun
description.italian: Risolvi 3 rompicapi di oggetti nascosti facendo meno di 5 errori in ciascuno
description.koreana: 각각 실수를 5번 이상 하지 않고 숨은 그림찾기 퍼즐 3개를 완료하세요.
description.schinese: 完成3个隐藏物品智力游戏，每个中不超过5个错误
description.russian: Завершить 3 загадки со спрятанными предметами, сделав в каждой из них не более 5 ошибок
description.japanese: 3つの隠しオブジェクトパズルを、各５以下のミスで完了する
description.polish: Ukończ trzy zagadki z Ukrytymi Obiektami z mniej niż pięcioma pomyłkami

description.english: Complete any Hidden Object Puzzle without using a Hint
description.german: Vollende ein beliebiges Wimmelbild-Puzzle ohne einen Hinweis
description.french: Termine un Puzzle d’Objets Cachés sans utiliser d’Indice
description.italian: Completa un rompicapo di oggetti nascosti senza ricorrere all'Indizio
description.koreana: 힌트를 사용하지 않고 숨은 그림찾기 퍼즐을 모두 완료하세요.
description.schinese: 在不使用提示的情况下完成任意一个隐藏物品智力游戏
description.russian: Завершите любую загадку со спрятанными предметами без Подсказки
description.japanese: いずれかの隠しオブジェクトパズルをヒントを使わずに終える
description.polish: Ukończ jakąkolwiek zagadkę z Ukrytymi Obiektami bez Podpowiedzi

description.english: Finish any Hidden Object Puzzle in less than 30 seconds
description.german: Beende ein beliebiges Wimmelbild-Puzzle in weniger als 30 Sekunden

description.italian: Completa un rompicapo di oggetti nascosti in meno di 30 secondi
description.koreana: 30초 안에 숨은 그림찾기 퍼즐 하나를 마치세요.
description.schinese: 在少于30秒的时间内完成任意一个隐藏物品智力游戏
description.russian: Завершите любую загадку со спрятанными предметами менее, чем за 30 секунд
description.japanese: 30秒以内にいずれかの隠しオブジェクトパズルを終える
description.polish: Ukończ jakąkolwiek zagadkę z Ukrytymi Obiektami w mniej niż trzydzieści sekund

description.english: Complete all Hidden Object Puzzles without using a Hint
description.german: Vollende alle Wimmelbild-Puzzles ohne einen Hinweis

description.schinese: 在不使用提示的情况下完成所有隐藏物品智力游戏

description.japanese: すべての隠しオブジェクトパズルをヒントを使わずに終える

description.english: Get to Vyrai

description.french: Trouve le Prisme
description.italian: Trova il prisma

description.english: Prove yourself and summon Perun
description.german: Beweise dich und rufe Perun herbei

description.italian: Dimostra il tuo valore e evoca Perun

description.russian: Докажите, на что способны, и призовите Перуна
description.japanese: 自分を証明し、ペルンを召喚する

description.english: Bring the Zmey Scepter
description.german: Bring das Zmey-Szepter

description.italian: Recupera lo scettro Zmey

description.japanese: ズメイの笏をもたらす

description.english: Help John acknowledge his powers
description.german: Hilf John, seine Kräfte zu entdecken
description.french: Aide John à prendre conscience de ses pouvoirs
description.italian: Aiuta John a scoprire i suoi poteri
description.koreana: 존을 도와 그가 자신의 능력을 깨닫도록 해주세요.
description.schinese: 帮助约翰认识到他的能力
description.japanese: ジョンが自分の力を認めるのを助ける
description.polish: Pomóż Johnowi odkryć w sobie magiczne moce

description.english: Stop the ritual and defeat the King
description.german: Stoppe das Ritual und besiege den König
description.french: Arrête le rituel et bats le roi
description.italian: Blocca il rituale e sconfiggi il re
description.schinese: 阻止仪式并打败国王
description.japanese: 儀式を止め、王を倒す

description.english: Watch all the cutscenes from the first hour of the game
description.german: Schau dir alle Filmszenen aus der ersten Stunde des Spiels an
description.french: Regarde toutes les cinématiques de la première heure du jeu
description.italian: Guarda tutti i filmati della prima ora di gioco
description.koreana: 게임 첫 시간에 편집된 화면들을 모두 시청하세요.
description.schinese: 观看游戏中第一个小时里的全部过场动画
description.russian: Просмотреть все заставки первого часа игры
description.japanese: ゲームの最初の１時間の、すべてのカットシーンを見る
description.polish: Obejrzyj wszystkie cutsceny w pierwszej godzinie gry

description.schinese: 阅读游戏中的全部笔记
description.japanese: ゲーム中に配置された、全てのメモを読む

description.english: Finish all Battle Runes Minigames without a mistake
description.german: Vollende alle Runen-Minispiele ohne Fehler

description.italian: Completa i mini giochi della battaglia delle rune senza un errore

description.schinese: 在不犯错的情况下完成所有战斗北欧小游戏

description.polish: Wygraj wszystkie Minigry Walki Runów bez pomyłki

description.schinese: 在不犯错的情况下完成两个旅行小游戏
